name: Dice Dash (howaito)
description:
Dice Dash is an endless runner where you'll collect Dices to grow more sides for your own Dice! With each iteration of the D1  to D20 cycle, the game gets faster. Reach higher levels to meet more enemy types! 


Currently still in development - Leave me a comment if something about the game bugs you and I'll fix it with the next version : )
